metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47010 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered function pr_function_type in prdbg.c in Binutils2.34 thru 2.38, allows attackers to cause a denial of service due to memoryleaks.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47010` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-common - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-for-build - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-for-host - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-multiarch - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-source - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-x86-64-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
libbinutils - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
libctf-nobfd0 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
libctf0 - 2.38-4ubuntu2.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: binutils package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.38-4ubuntu2.5').
